content.text:
Find all research files in /root/clawd/memory/ directory and read their contents to send to the user.

Look for these files (and any others):
- nba-player-prop-research.md
- data-sources.md
- mlb-pitcher-prop-research.md
- open-source-betting-models.md

Read each file's contents and prepare a message to send to the user containing all the research findings. The user wants the files, so organize them clearly with section headers for each research area.

Return the complete content of all research files formatted for sending to the user via Telegram.
